sentences.en: He recently retired as Vice - president of the Eisenhower Medical Center Foundation in Rancho Mirage, California.
sentences.cn: 前不久他从加州RanchoMirage艾森豪医学中心基金的副总裁职务退休.

sentences.en: Shiva Moradfar of Rancho Santa Fe believes her home escaped the fire.
sentences.cn: 圣达菲的希佛相信,他的家逃过一劫.

words.tran_cn: 牧场上工人的棚屋；牧场

trans.tran_cn: 大牧场（或大农场）工人住的棚屋
trans.tran_en: a hut or group of huts for housing ranch workers
